SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp

Class JSPDependencyTracker

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jsp.JSPDependencyTracker
public class JSPDependencyTracker extends Object
Tracks dependencies between JSP files to enable incremental compilation.

JSP files can include other files via:

  • <%@ include file="..." %> - Static includes (compile-time)
  • <jsp:include page="..." /> - Dynamic includes (runtime)
  • Taglib references

This tracker monitors:

  • Last modification times of JSP files
  • Dependencies between JSP files
  • Taglib TLD files

When a dependency changes, all dependent JSP files are marked for recompilation.

Author:
Chris Burdess

    • JSPDependencyTracker

      public JSPDependencyTracker(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext, File webappRoot)
      Creates a new dependency tracker for the given servlet context.
      Parameters:
      servletContext - the servlet context
      webappRoot - the root directory of the web application

  • Method Details

    • recordCompilation

      public void recordCompilation(String jspPath, Set<String> includedFiles)
      Records that a JSP file was successfully compiled.
      Parameters:
      jspPath - the JSP file path
      includedFiles - the set of files included by this JSP

    • needsRecompilation

      public boolean needsRecompilation(String jspPath)
      Checks if a JSP file needs recompilation.

      A JSP needs recompilation if:

      • It has never been compiled
      • The JSP file has been modified since last compilation
      • Any of its dependencies have been modified since last compilation
      Parameters:
      jspPath - the JSP file path
      Returns:
      true if the JSP needs recompilation

    • invalidate

      public Set<String> invalidate(String path)
      Invalidates a JSP file and all files that depend on it.
      Parameters:
      path - the path that was modified
      Returns:
      the set of JSP files that need recompilation

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all tracked compilation state. This forces all JSP files to be recompiled on next access.

    • getDependencies

      public Set<String> getDependencies(String jspPath)
      Returns the set of dependencies for a JSP file.
      Parameters:
      jspPath - the JSP file path
      Returns:
      the set of dependencies, or an empty set if none

    • getDependents

      public Set<String> getDependents(String path)
      Returns the set of JSP files that depend on the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - the included file path
      Returns:
      the set of dependent JSP files, or an empty set if none

    • getLastCompilationTime

      public long getLastCompilationTime(String jspPath)
      Returns the last compilation time for a JSP file.
      Parameters:
      jspPath - the JSP file path
      Returns:
      the last compilation time, or -1 if never compiled
